sph.vaadin.ui.svg

Class SvgDots

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractJavaScriptComponent
      • sph.vaadin.ui.svg.SvgDots
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuestionDots

    public class SvgDots
extends AbstractJavaScriptComponent
    SvgDots Component draws colored circles (dots) horizontally to an SVG canvas.

    Uses Raphaël—JavaScript Library for SVG graphics.

    copyright © Ville-Video 2013

    Since:
    19.10.2013
    Version:
    1.01
    Author:
    Sami Holck, Juha Mäkilä
    See Also:
    Raphaël—JavaScript Library, Raphaël Reference, FRaphael Filter Effects for Raphaël, FRaphael documentation, w3schools.com SVG Reference

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SvgDots.Dot
      Dot contains all the required information about a single SVG dot in SvgDots component.
      static interface  SvgDots.DotListener
      SvgDotsListener interface for listening to SvgDots.Dot events fired by an SvgDots component.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SvgDots()
      Default Constructor: Creates an empty SVG canvas for SvgDots.Dot elements.
      SvgDots(Collection<SvgDots.Dot> dots)
      Draws an amount of dots.size() SvgDots.Dot elements to the SVG canvas.
      SvgDots(int count)
      Constructor: Creates amount of count Silver grey colored clickable SvgDots.Dot elements into an SVG canvas.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SvgDots

        public SvgDots()
        Default Constructor: Creates an empty SVG canvas for SvgDots.Dot elements.

      • SvgDots

        public SvgDots(int count)
        Constructor: Creates amount of count Silver grey colored clickable SvgDots.Dot elements into an SVG canvas.
        Parameters:
        count - the number of the created SvgDots.Dot elements.
        Preconditions:
        count >= 0
        Postconditions:
        size() == count & FORALL(dot : this}; dot.getColor().equals("") & dot.getTitle().equals("") & dot.isClickable() == true)

      • SvgDots

        public SvgDots(Collection<SvgDots.Dot> dots)
        Draws an amount of dots.size() SvgDots.Dot elements to the SVG canvas.
        Parameters:
        dots - the list of the SVG dots.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(Collection<SvgDots.Dot> dotList)
        Draws the given SvgDots.Dot elements to the SVG canvas.

        NOTE: removes all previously defined SvgDots.Dot elements.

        Parameters:
        dotList - a collection of dots.

      • getDot

        public SvgDots.Dot getDot(int index)
        Returns the element at the specified position in this list.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the element to return.
        Returns:
        index of the element to return.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size()).

      • replaceDot

        public void replaceDot(int index,
              SvgDots.Dot dot)
        Replaces the SvgDots.Dot element at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the replaced the SvgDots.Dot element.
        dot - the SvgDots.Dot element.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size())

      • setDotColor

        public void setDotColor(int index,
               String color)
        Sets the color of the SvgDots.Dot element on the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the SvgDots.Dot.
        color - the color of the SvgDots.Dot.

      • setDotTitle

        public void setDotTitle(int index,
               String title)
        Sets the title of the SvgDots.Dot on the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the SvgDots.Dot.
        title - the color of the SvgDots.Dot.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of SVG dots drawn into this SvgDots.
        Returns:
        the number of dots in this SvgDots Component
        Postconditions:
        RESULT >= 0

      • addDotsListener

        public void addDotsListener(String eventName,
                   SvgDots.DotListener listener)
        Adds a new SvgDots.DotListener listener into the SvgDots component.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the name of the SvgDots.DotListener event.
        listener - the event listener object itself.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(String eventName,
                  SvgDots.DotListener listener)
        Remove listener from a specific SvgDots.DotListener event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the name of the SvgDots.DotListener event.
        listener - the event listener to remove.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(SvgDots.DotListener listener)
        Remove listener from all SvgDots.DotListener events it is registered by. Convenient way of cleaning up an listener object being destroyed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the event listener to remove.

      • toString

        public String toString()

      • createDot

        public static SvgDots.Dot createDot(String color,
                    String title,
                    boolean clickable)
        Returns a new SvgDots.Dot element of color color and title title for an SvgDots component.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to set
        title - the title to set.
        clickable - a boolean value specifying whether the dot is clickable or not.
        Returns:
        the dot element created.
